Files Headings

_baseAggregator.js

 
var baseEach = require('./_baseEach');

Aggregates elements of collection on accumulator with keys transformed by iteratee and values set by setter.

Params
collection Array Object The collection to iterate over.
setter Function The function to set accumulator values.
iteratee Function The iteratee to transform keys.
accumulator Object The initial aggregated object. 
function baseAggregator(collection, setter, iteratee, accumulator) {
  baseEach(collection, function(value, key, collection) {
    setter(accumulator, value, iteratee(value), collection);
  });
  return accumulator;
}

module.exports = baseAggregator;
